description: This is the specimen protocol charge table for anatomic pathology specimens.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AP_PRO_CHARGE_ID
columns.description: This will save the specimen-level protocol charge for the anatomic pathology specimen.

columns.name: AP_PRO_CHARGE_QTY
columns.description: This will save the specimen-level protocol charge quantity for the anatomic pathology specimen.

columns.name: AP_CHG_TR_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The charge trigger status category ID for the anatomic pathology (AP) protocol level charge.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Tech/No type charges have been triggered


Professional charges have been triggered


All types of charges have been triggered

columns.name: CHARGE_SS_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure that was the last dropped charge for the AP specimen.

columns.name: CHARGE_QTY_SS
columns.description: The quantity associated with the last dropped charge (CHARGE_SS_PROC_ID) for the AP specimen.
